EmailTemplate.description: Send to customer after records have been updated.
EmailTemplate.name: Update - Update Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Privacy Request - Update Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
We have received your request for the update of the personal information that DuPont has concerning you.
Be advised that your personal information has been updated in our database(s).
For further questions and assistance, please contact us using the details provided below.
Sincerely,
DuPont Corporate Contact 974 Centre Road Chestnut Run Plaza 735 2175-1 Wilmington, DE 19805 Toll-free: 1-800-569-0964
